did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: O.P. Phelps record of marriages and baptisms, 1846-1888.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Included are records of marriages performed in Chautauqua County, Steuben County, Tioga County, and Yates County, New York, and five towns in Pennsylvania (1846-1888); baptisms (1849); a list of donations (1848); and various subscription lists.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p: Oliver Phelps Alderman was a clergyman who served various congregations in Chautauqua, Schuyler, Steuben, Tioga and Yates Counties in New York.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Included are records of marriages performed in Chautauqua County, Steuben County, Tioga County, and Yates County, New York, and five towns in Pennsylvania (1846-1888); baptisms (1849); a list of donations (1848); and various subscription lists.
